meanings.definition: Not shaded or protected from sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The playground had an unshaded area where the sun was very bright.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to sit in the unshaded spot to feel the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent3: The unshaded picnic table made it hard to see the food in the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her unshaded face showed the effects of too much sun exposure.
meanings.sent5: The unshaded desert stretched endlessly under the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: Not having any areas of darkness or shadow.
meanings.sent1: The room was unshaded, with every corner brightly lit.
meanings.sent2: The unshaded painting on the wall seemed to glow in the light.
meanings.sent3: The unshaded alley felt strangely safe without any hidden shadows.
meanings.sent4: Her unshaded thoughts were clear and free from doubt.
meanings.sent5: The unshaded sky was a perfect blue without a single cloud.

meanings.sent1: The unshaded truth was finally revealed for all to see.
meanings.sent2: His unshaded emotions were written plainly on his face.
meanings.sent3: The unshaded answer was so obvious, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unshaded intentions were crystal clear to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unshaded map showed all the paths without any secrets.
